org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr

Class DbLockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr.DbLockManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiveLockManager

    public final class DbLockManager
extends Object
implements HiveLockManager
    An implementation of HiveLockManager for use with DbTxnManager. Note, this lock manager is not meant to be stand alone. It cannot be used without the DbTxnManager. See DbTxnManager.getMS() for important concurrency/metastore access notes.
